name: developer-portal
description: This project aims to integrate the latest version of Wordpress with Mashery's API Management Service. It is composed of three parts:

scripts.bootstrap: npm run wpinstall && npm run activate-theme && npm run open
scripts.mysqldump: docker exec $npm_package_name mysqldump --add-drop-database --add-drop-table -h localhost -u root -p$(docker exec $npm_package_name cat /mysql-root-pw.txt) wordpress > ./data.sql
scripts.mysql: docker exec $npm_package_name mysql -h localhost -u root -p$(docker exec $npm_package_name cat /mysql-root-pw.txt) wordpress < ./data.sql
